response.original_title: Love and Other Manias: The Story of Malga Kubiak
response.overview: The story of an eccentric and sexually ambitious performer and underground filmmaker. Originally from Poland, Kubiak has lived and worked in Sweden since the 1980s. Through interviews with her and former employees in her film and performance projects, family members, ex-lovers, muses and actors forms a lively and critical analysis of Kubiakâ€™s life and work.
response.title: Love and Other Manias: The Story of Malga Kubiak
